column2: Abandoned Factory
column3: Abandoned Factory

column2: We're here to capture the abandoned factory.
column3: We're here to capture the abandoned factory.

column2: Move up, get eyes on the facility, and see what we're facing. We can make a plan from there.
column3: Move up, get eyes on the facility, and see what we're facing. We can make a plan from there.

column2: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Good luck, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: The base is ours, Commander. Well done.
column3: The base is ours, Commander. Well done.

column2: This situation has gone from bad to worse. I'm pulling out, Commander.
column3: This situation has gone from bad to worse. I'm pulling out, Commander.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!
column3: Dropship inbound for landing! We're going to get in and out quick!

column2: Commander, bad news. We're seeing energy signatures for fixed defenses powering up.
column3: Commander, bad news. We're seeing energy signatures for fixed defenses powering up.

column2: Turrets. Remember they can spot you from a very long way off, Commander.
column3: Turrets. Remember they can spot you from a very long way off, Commander.

column2: The facility looks unoccupied save for some automated turrets, Commander. If we can bust those defenses and get inside the perimeter, our employer can send in their salvage crews to take control.
column3: The facility looks unoccupied save for some automated turrets, Commander. If we can bust those defenses and get inside the perimeter, our employer can send in their salvage crews to take control.

column2: Watch for additional contacts. The base's defenders may be out on patrol.
column3: Watch for additional contacts. The base's defenders may be out on patrol.

column2: Somehow I doubt there's a lost 'Mech factory on this backwater world. It probably manufactures low-g bicycles or something else useless.
column3: Somehow I doubt there's a lost 'Mech factory on this backwater world. It probably manufactures low-g bicycles or something else useless.

column2: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
column3: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

column2: Scout the Factory
column3: Scout the Factory

column2: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
column3: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

column2: Destroy the Enemy Force
column3: Destroy the Enemy Force

column2: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.
column3: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

column3: Occupy the Base

column3: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

column3: Hold Out as Enemies Counter Attack

column3: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

column3: Pacify the Area Around the Base

column2: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
column3: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

column2: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements
column3: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Reinforcements

column3: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

column2: Eliminate Base Turrets
column3: Eliminate Base Turrets

column2: A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} patrol detected unexpected signals here in {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, and we'd like you to investigate. Analysis suggests that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has reactivated an abandoned factory on the planet's surface. We don't know what this particular facility was used for, but given the effort they're sinking into this, it must be valuable. We want it.
column3: A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} patrol detected unexpected signals here in {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, and we'd like you to investigate. Analysis suggests that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has reactivated an abandoned factory on the planet's surface. We don't know what this particular facility was used for, but given the effort they're sinking into this, it must be valuable. We want it.

column2: Contested Will
column3: Contested Will

column2: This is where the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} 'ancestral' fortress is located.
column3: This is where the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} 'ancestral' fortress is located.

column2: Let's get eyes on it and see how many enemy units we're going to be facing.
column3: Let's get eyes on it and see how many enemy units we're going to be facing.

column2: Then move up, clear out any defenders, and hold the area until {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces arrive to relieve you.
column3: Then move up, clear out any defenders, and hold the area until {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces arrive to relieve you.

column2: Well done, Commander; the fortress is ours. There are {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces inbound to take possession.
column3: Well done, Commander; the fortress is ours. There are {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces inbound to take possession.

column2: For an 'ancestral' fortress, this place was awfully well-guarded. I'm pulling the plug, Commander.
column3: For an 'ancestral' fortress, this place was awfully well-guarded. I'm pulling the plug, Commander.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: DropShip inbound, Commander!
column3: DropShip inbound, Commander!

column2: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
column3: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.

column2: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
column3: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.

column2: This is the ancestral fortress? This looks like a modern, operational military base to me.
column3: This is the ancestral fortress? This looks like a modern, operational military base to me.

column2: I don't like this. Watch for enemy reinforcements, Commander.
column3: I don't like this. Watch for enemy reinforcements, Commander.

column2: I don't buy the 'ancestral fortress' part of this, but the legal maneuverings check out. Commander, a merc company coming in could resolve this quickly and prevent a large-scale conflict.
column3: I don't buy the 'ancestral fortress' part of this, but the legal maneuverings check out. Commander, a merc company coming in could resolve this quickly and prevent a large-scale conflict.

column2: A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} family lost a large area of land on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, thanks to dubious legal maneuvering by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} agents. This land includes an important ancestral military base. We need this base taken back from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} and held until this can be sorted out.
column3: A {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} family lost a large area of land on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, thanks to dubious legal maneuvering by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} agents. This land includes an important ancestral military base. We need this base taken back from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} and held until this can be sorted out.

column3: Logistical Base Capture

column3: Commander, I'm not picking up any active hostiles, anywhere. The place looks deserted.

column2: Let's move up and recon the facility.
column3: Let's move up and recon the facility.

column2: Once we know what we're dealing with, we can move in and occupy the depot.
column3: Once we know what we're dealing with, we can move in and occupy the depot.

column2: The depot is ours, Commander.

column2: We're ready to pull you out of there.

column3: What the hell? There's no garrison. ... Wait, we're getting something.

column3: Commander, it looks like the garrison was on patrol, and they're on the way back. Get ready for multiple contacts.

column2: This should be straightforward. Move up, recon the depot, and then occupy it. Once we secure the area, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} will send in their people to loot the place.

column2: We've been tracking the movement of several {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoys, and that's allowed us to pinpoint their destinations: a hidden, well-defended logistics depot. This facility is a key supplier for  {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces in this region, and taking it from them will significantly damage their efforts against us. We'd like you to drop in, take the depot, and hold out against any enemy reinforcements.
column3: We've been tracking the movement of several {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} convoys, and that's allowed us to pinpoint their destinations: a hidden, well-defended logistics depot. This facility is a key supplier for  {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces in this region, and taking it from them will significantly damage their efforts against us. We'd like you to drop in, take the depot, and hold out against any enemy reinforcements.

column2: Nine-Tenths of the Law
column3: Nine-Tenths of the Law

column2: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility that we're here to capture should be just ahead, Commander.
column3: The {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility that we're here to capture should be just ahead, Commander.

column2: Before we go for the base, we should get eyes on the enemy - the positioning of their garrison, and ideally the layout of the base itself.
column3: Before we go for the base, we should get eyes on the enemy - the positioning of their garrison, and ideally the layout of the base itself.

column2: Remember, that base is our payday, and our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} employers want it intact. Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.
column3: Remember, that base is our payday, and our {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} employers want it intact. Good hunting, Commander. Oliveira out.

column2: The base is ours, Commander.
column3: The base is ours, Commander.

column2: We're ready to take you out of there.
column3: We're ready to take you out of there.

column2: Sit tight, the employer will be very pleased with this haul.
column3: Sit tight, the employer will be very pleased with this haul.

column2: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.
column3: We won't be able to take this one. Pack it in, Commander.

column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Leopard inbound, Commander! Get to the LZ for evac, I'm coming in hot!
column3: Leopard inbound, Commander! Get to the LZ for evac, I'm coming in hot!

column2: Word of warning, Commander: this base is likely to be defended by point defense turrets.
column3: Word of warning, Commander: this base is likely to be defended by point defense turrets.

column2: I can't tell you what their operational range is likely to be, or what armaments they're going to carry. Just... be careful. Oliveira out.
column3: I can't tell you what their operational range is likely to be, or what armaments they're going to carry. Just... be careful. Oliveira out.

column2: You should have a clear view of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility now, Commander.
column3: You should have a clear view of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} facility now, Commander.

column2: Keep your eyes peeled for enemy reinforcements. I have reports of additional {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} contacts in the area, and they're likely to rally back to the base when it falls under attack. Be ready for them.
column3: Keep your eyes peeled for enemy reinforcements. I have reports of additional {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} contacts in the area, and they're likely to rally back to the base when it falls under attack. Be ready for them.

column2: The legal justification here sounds sketchy, Commander, but we're mercenaries, not lawyers. As long as they're happy, we get paid.
column3: The legal justification here sounds sketchy, Commander, but we're mercenaries, not lawyers. As long as they're happy, we get paid.

column2: We've learned that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have constructed a forward base on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, ignoring the express wishes of the local government. Naturally, the planetary governor is furious, but he can't make a stand against {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} BattleMechs without assistance; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has offered that assistance. You are to seize control of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base and hold it until we gain a legal claim to the facility. We will then sell it back to the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} government at a considerable discount.
column3: We've learned that {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces have constructed a forward base on {TGT_SYSTEM.name}, ignoring the express wishes of the local government. Naturally, the planetary governor is furious, but he can't make a stand against {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} BattleMechs without assistance; {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has offered that assistance. You are to seize control of the {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base and hold it until we gain a legal claim to the facility. We will then sell it back to the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} government at a considerable discount.

column2: Apparently {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} controls a network of transports and warehouses in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, moving mostly mundane merchandise but also a very few highly valuable goods. Our clandestine research efforts have acquired the latest shipping manifests and identified an opportunity for a swift, profitable strike at a key shipping hub. If timed properly, your Mechs can attack quickly and pave the way for a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} extraction team to empty the warehouse of its contents.
column3: Apparently {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} controls a network of transports and warehouses in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, moving mostly mundane merchandise but also a very few highly valuable goods. Our clandestine research efforts have acquired the latest shipping manifests and identified an opportunity for a swift, profitable strike at a key shipping hub. If timed properly, your Mechs can attack quickly and pave the way for a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} extraction team to empty the warehouse of its contents.

column2: The B Team
column3: The B Team

column2: So all we gotta do is just walk in there and stand around? This job sounds like bullshit to me. I wanna learn how to shoot, not stand around!
column3: So all we gotta do is just walk in there and stand around? This job sounds like bullshit to me. I wanna learn how to shoot, not stand around!

column2: I don't know, the mission sounds good to me. I need more practice driving this thing, anyway.
column3: I don't know, the mission sounds good to me. I need more practice driving this thing, anyway.

column2: Let's confirm the base is undefended. Commander, move up to this location and you should be able to get eyes on the base.
column3: Let's confirm the base is undefended. Commander, move up to this location and you should be able to get eyes on the base.

column2: Can we blow up some of the buildings?
column3: Can we blow up some of the buildings?

column2: Well... that certainly was an experience. Darius, I think we should get hazard pay for this kind of mission.
column3: Well... that certainly was an experience. Darius, I think we should get hazard pay for this kind of mission.

column2: Stow it, Meyer. It all worked out fine, and we get paid.
column3: Stow it, Meyer. It all worked out fine, and we get paid.

column2: I think these kids could use some more time on the practice range.
column3: I think these kids could use some more time on the practice range.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: Bogeys on sensors!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.

column2: Dropship inbound for landing!
column3: Dropship inbound for landing!

column2: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.
column3: Commander, a word of warning, we have reports this base may have gun emplacements for point defense.

column2: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.
column3: Turrets, boss. Just keep an eye out in case they are online.

column2: There's the base up ahead. Looks like our employer wasn't kidding; it's empty.
column3: There's the base up ahead. Looks like our employer wasn't kidding; it's empty.

column2: That sucks. Can I shoot some of the buildings anyway?
column3: That sucks. Can I shoot some of the buildings anyway?

column2: Huh. I'm picking up engine signatures, boss. I'm guessing those aren't friendlies, and they're headed your way.
column3: Huh. I'm picking up engine signatures, boss. I'm guessing those aren't friendlies, and they're headed your way.

column2: Engines? Like, 'Mech engines? Oh shit, oh shit, I don't want to die-
column3: Engines? Like, 'Mech engines? Oh shit, oh shit, I don't want to die-

column2: Get your lance into that base, Commander, and hold out till our employer can get some more people on the ground.
column3: Get your lance into that base, Commander, and hold out till our employer can get some more people on the ground.

column2: This seems like the kind of setup where afterwards we'll say 'It was supposed to be undefended!', Commander. Be prepared.
column3: This seems like the kind of setup where afterwards we'll say 'It was supposed to be undefended!', Commander. Be prepared.

column2: We're training a group of MechWarriors to act as a local defense force, and we'd like you to assist in their training. There's a decommissioned {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base that we need to take ownership of. As it's undefended, this is a perfect opportunity for our trainees to practice operating as a team in a low-risk environment. We need you to send along a single experienced MechWarrior to keep an eye on them and model good behavior for them.
column3: We're training a group of MechWarriors to act as a local defense force, and we'd like you to assist in their training. There's a decommissioned {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} base that we need to take ownership of. As it's undefended, this is a perfect opportunity for our trainees to practice operating as a team in a low-risk environment. We need you to send along a single experienced MechWarrior to keep an eye on them and model good behavior for them.
